goal: Baring Asset Management is an international investment management firm offering actively managed investment solutions. We work with institutional and wholesale clients and their intermediaries across the globe. Our product range includes specialist equities, multi asset and fixed income.
euInitiatives: Measures relating to financial services, in particular asset management, development of capital markets and consumer protection
